A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While a visually stunning film\, I felt the story lacked the heart that made me care about the characters since I was a small child seeing Episode IV for the first time. Whatever was missing\, this is the first time I actually don't care what happens next. I loved Force Awakens\, loved Rogue One - but this one was genuinely forgettable and seeing Luke blunder so badly as a teacher and as a Jedi was truly heartbreaking. Absolutely the end of an era\, and in no way the beginning of a better one.
